data.name: Curvature
data.detailed_description:
Some locations in the universe reveal strange anomalies, called curves. A special technology allows to detect and to activate the curves, using them as wormholes for intergalactic travel. A group of socially and technologically advanced species, which independently discovered this technology, have formed an alliance. Occasionally, new civilizations that are on the brink of discovering the curves are found. In case these species show highly aggressive or parasitic behavior, it must be confined by the alliance.

Take control of an infiltrator, on a mission in a highly volatile world. A planet, controlled by gruesome creatures, abusing and corrupting everything in their reach.

A mysterious and atmospheric, vast and varied open world:

  • From caves to high tech facilities
  • From animals to empire military
  • Meet fearsome enemies and unexpected friends
  • Everything and everyone is living and breathing in a highly detailed interactive world
  • Different species and factions interact with or fight each other

Fight fearsome enemies and bosses:

  • Strong and varied AI will keep you on your toes
  • Deep combat system, are you ready for your dance lessons?
  • Some of your enemies will swarm and surround you, communicate with each other and run away, if they need to

Interesting problems and puzzles:

  • Not just jumping and dodging, but also thinking - traps and buttons, cannons and cables
  • Ain't got the mechanical skill? Maybe there is a smart way
  • Solve problems of the friends you find along the way
  • A real adventure, no picnic in a park - almost nothing comes for free, earn your rewards and progression

Manipulate your environment to overcome obstacles and to defeat your foes:

  • Like your foes, you may also interact with your environment in a variety of ways
  • Metroidvania of a different kind - there is more then one way or solution
  • Unique telekinetic abilities allow you to manipulate your environment and enemies

Use a sheer variety of gadgets and weapons to create your own playstyle and to adapt to any situation:

  • Melee and ranged weaponry of different kinds, from living spears, growing longer on piercing your foes, to laser beams melting everything in your way
  • Shields and tactical gadgets, like energy wall, blocking projectiles and beams
  • Mobility options, like grappling hook, or teleportation device
  • Unique special devices - you want to take control of your enemy, or go invisible? No problem, we've got you covered!

data.short_description: Take control of a highly adaptable battle machine and infiltrate a hostile civilization to keep peace in the universe. Build your own playstyle with a vast amount of gadgets, weapons and unique abilities. Survive and dominate a harsh and atmospheric world.

English*, German
*languages with full audio support
